title: en.wikipedia.org_wiki_LabX_Media_Group
transformers_text: Lab X Media Group is an Ontario based media and technology company focused on the biological research community 1 Founded in 1995 as an online marketplace for laboratory equipment it has grown through various acquisitions to now have a presence in publishing and laboratory services 2 Lab X Media Group operates under a number of different brands representing different industries The company was originally founded as Lab X an online marketplace for laboratory products 1 Degree Bio an online marketplace for life sciences products was founded in 2009 as an independent company but was acquired by Lab X Media Group in 2016 3 Lab Wrench com an online forum for discussing laboratory equipment was started by Lab X Media Group in 2010 and is now partially integrated into the Lab X marketplace 4 The other major arm of Lab X Media Group's brands is science publishing Lab Manager Magazine acquired in 2008 is a trade journal for research lab managers 4 The Scientist magazine acquired in 2011 is a professional magazine targeted towards life science researchers with articles on current biology research 4 In 2016 Lab X Media Group acquired UK based Technology Networks another trade journal targeted towards research scientists 2 In 2020 Lab X Media Group acquired IFL Science 2 a popular science website founded by Elise Andrew In 2024 Lab X Media acquired Discover Magazine from Kal m bach Media 5
